Question
========

A researcher looks at toddlers' motor development at three time points. Which method of analysis is appropriate for this purpose? 
Answerlist
----------
* ANCOVA.
* Multiple regression.
* Factorial ANOVA.
* Repeated measures ANOVA.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
